thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Mohammed Sayal

author: Mohammed Sayal
title: Mohammed Sayal
text:
Booked a car with an insurance company that wouldn't insure me even though I only had 6 points and all OTHER MAJOR car hire companies did insure me.
Asked to change the booking over to my wife's name so we could take the car out on her name, and the company refused! Worst customer service available. Would never use this company again ... absolute con! Had to pay for my 0 excess again! Ruined my trip! Avoid as much as you can
